submitted-receipt-email.html_body:
Hi {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.fullName }}

Thanks for applying to run an event in the Canterbury district.

We'll be in touch by email within 8 working days to confirm if there is any further information we need to finalise your booking.

If you need to update us in the meantime you can view the details of your case and contact us online

Thanks,
Canterbury City Council
submitted-receipt-email.subject: Your event booking receipt {{ case.reference }}
submitted-receipt-email.title: E2 Submitted receipt email

booking-confirmed-email.html_body:
Hi {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.fullName }}

Thanks for applying to run an event in the Canterbury district. This emails confirms your booking.

Reference: {{ case.reference }}

If you need to update us before you hold your event you can view the details of your case and contact us online

Thanks,
Canterbury City Council
booking-confirmed-email.subject: Confirmation of your event booking {{ case.reference }}
booking-confirmed-email.title: E1 Booking confirmed email

e3-email-about-reserved-conditions.html_body:
Hi {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.fullName }}

We've now reviewed your event application.

To confirm your booking we ask that you provide the following by {{ case.values.deadline.value }}

{{ case.values.description_of_further_requirements.value }}

You can find guidance and templates for additional documents on our website.

If you need to update us about your case you can view the details of your case and contact us online

Thanks,
Canterbury City Council
e3-email-about-reserved-conditions.subject: An update on your event booking {{ case.reference }}
e3-email-about-reserved-conditions.title: E3 Email about reserved conditions

e4-email-staff-about-new-customer-intera.html_body:
Hi,

A citizen has left a message for you on case {{ case.reference }}

View the case online
e4-email-staff-about-new-customer-intera.subject: Citizen has left a message for you {{ case.reference }}
e4-email-staff-about-new-customer-intera.title: E4 Email staff about new customer interaction

e6-email-customer-about-new-staff-messag.html_body:
Hi {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.fullName }}

A message has been left for you about your public event booking (reference: {{ case.reference }})

You can read and respond to the message online

Thanks,

Canterbury City Council
e6-email-customer-about-new-staff-messag.subject: An update on your event booking {{ case.reference }}
e6-email-customer-about-new-staff-messag.title: E6 Email customer about new staff message

e7-email-customer-explaining-cancellatio.html_body:
Hi {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.fullName }}

Your event booking (reference: {{ case.reference }}) has been cancelled. The reason for cancellation is:

{{ case.values.reason_for_cancellation.value }}

You can view the details of your case and contact us online.

Thanks,

Canterbury City Council
e7-email-customer-explaining-cancellatio.subject: Event order {{ case.reference }} has been cancelled
e7-email-customer-explaining-cancellatio.title: E7 Email customer explaining cancellation

e16-email-customer-road-closure-payment-.html_body:
Hi {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.fullName }}

We've now reviewed your event application.

To confirm your booking we ask that you provide the following by {{ case.values.deadline.value }}:

{{ case.values.description_of_further_requirements.value }}

Because your event includes a road closure you will also need to pay a road closure fee of £120 before this date. You can pay this online now by quoting the reference {{ case.reference }}

You can find guidance and templates for additional documents on our website.

If you need to update us about your case you can view the details of your case and contact us online

Thanks,
Canterbury City Council
e16-email-customer-road-closure-payment-.subject: Road closure payment needed for event booking {{ case.reference }}
e16-email-customer-road-closure-payment-.title: E16 Email customer road closure payment details

e15-last-chance-to-cancel-an-event.html_body:
Hi,

The deadline has now passed for events order {{ case.reference }} to complete the requirements listed below. If this has been done you can confirm the booking now, otherwise you need to cancel it or it will automatically be confirmed in two working days.

View and update the case online

Reservation conditions for this case:

{{ case.values.description_of_further_requirements.value }}
e15-last-chance-to-cancel-an-event.subject: Last chance to cancel reserved booking {{ case.reference }}
e15-last-chance-to-cancel-an-event.title: E15 Last chance to cancel an event

e8-first-reminder-to-customer.html_body:
Hi {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.fullName }}

This is just a reminder that before your event you will need to have completed the following:

{{ case.values.description_of_further_requirements.value }}

You can find guidance and templates for additional documents on our website.

If you've already done this then you can ignore this email. If not you will need to have completed it by {{ case.values.deadline.value }} or we may cancel your event booking.

If you need to update us about your case you can view the details of your case and contact us online

Thanks,

Canterbury City Council
e8-first-reminder-to-customer.subject: A reminder about your event order {{ case.reference }}
e8-first-reminder-to-customer.title: E8 First reminder to customer

e11-first-reminder-to-staff.html_body:
Hi,

The event order {{ case.reference }} was reserved with the following conditions:

{{ case.values.description_of_further_requirements.value }}

The deadline for these to be completed is {{ case.values.deadline.value }}

You can confirm that these have been received online now. If they haven't then we will send the customer a reminder.
e11-first-reminder-to-staff.subject: Event booking {{ case.reference }} still needs confirming
e11-first-reminder-to-staff.title: E11 First reminder to staff

e9-second-reminder-to-customer.html_body:
Hi {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.fullName }}

This is just a reminder that before your event you will need to have completed the following:

{{ case.values.description_of_further_requirements.value }}

You can find guidance and templates for additional documents on our website.

If you've already done this then you can ignore this email. If not you will need to have completed it by {{ case.values.deadline.value }} or we may cancel your event booking.

If you need to update us about your case you can view the details of your case and contact us online

Thanks,

Canterbury City Council
e9-second-reminder-to-customer.subject: A reminder about your event order {{ case.reference }}
e9-second-reminder-to-customer.title: E9 Second reminder to customer

e12-second-reminder-to-staff.html_body:
Hi,

The event order {{ case.reference }} was reserved with the following conditions:

{{ case.values.description_of_further_requirements.value }}

The deadline for these to be completed is {{ case.values.deadline.value }}

You can confirm that these have been received online now. If they haven't then we will send the customer a reminder.
e12-second-reminder-to-staff.subject: Event booking {{ case.reference }} still needs confirming
e12-second-reminder-to-staff.title: E12 Second reminder to staff

e10-third-reminder-to-customer.html_body:
Hi {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.fullName }}

This is just a reminder that before your event you will need to have completed the following:

{{ case.values.description_of_further_requirements.value }}

You can find guidance and templates for additional documents on our website.

If you've already done this then you can ignore this email. If not you will need to have completed it by {{ case.values.deadline.value }} or we may cancel your event booking.

If you need to update us about your case you can view the details of your case and contact us online

Thanks,

Canterbury City Council
e10-third-reminder-to-customer.subject: A reminder about your event order {{ case.reference }}
e10-third-reminder-to-customer.title: E10 Third reminder to customer

e13-third-reminder-to-staff.html_body:
Hi,

The event order {{ case.reference }} was reserved with the following conditions:

{{ case.values.description_of_further_requirements.value }}

The deadline for these to be completed is {{ case.values.deadline.value }}

You can confirm that these have been received online now. If they haven't then we will send the customer a reminder.
e13-third-reminder-to-staff.subject: Event booking {{ case.reference }} still needs confirming
e13-third-reminder-to-staff.title: E13 Third reminder to staff

e17-initial-email-to-sag.html_body:
Hi,

A new event application has been submitted in the Canterbury district, reference: {{ case.reference }}

You can view the details of this case and leave a comment for the customer online

Please leave any initial comments for the customer in the next five working days. We will then provisionally confirm or reject the application, and provide the customer with any details they need on next steps.

Thanks,

Canterbury City Council
e17-initial-email-to-sag.subject: Canterbury City Council: new event application {{ case.reference }}
e17-initial-email-to-sag.title: E17 Initial email to SAG
